modName: Complete Crafting Overhaul Remade - Breezhome Fully Upgradable Compatibility Patch
summary: Adds fur plates and different types of leather to the Enchanted Crafting Chest automatic pickup / crafting out of chest.
descriptionHtml:
[size=32]About[/size]
I found inconvenient that such a nice feature as automatic pickup of crafting ingredients doesn't work with some of the custom ones from CCO. So this patch adds them to automatic pickup and allows you to craft items like Fur Armors or others that require Fur Plates or Black / Red leather not actually storing these ingredients in your backpack.

This patch is pretty limited and requires Hearthfires / Dawnguard. I made only one version. However feel free to request a different versions in comments.

[size=32]Change log[/size]
Version 1.1
- added claws
- added assorted buckles
- added troll skull
- added human skull

[size=32]Credits[/size]
